card.name: Abundant Growth
card.text: Enchant land When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

card.name: Aggravate
card.text: Aggravate deals 1 damage to each creature target player controls. Each creature dealt damage this way attacks this turn if able.

card.name: Alchemist's Apprentice
card.text: Sacrifice Alchemist's Apprentice: Draw a card.

card.name: Alchemist's Refuge
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {G}{U}, {T}: You may cast nonland cards this turn as though they had flash.

card.name: Amass the Components
card.text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Angel of Glory's Rise
card.text: Flying When Angel of Glory's Rise enters the battlefield, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Angel of Jubilation
card.text: Flying Other nonblack creatures you control get +1/+1. Players can't pay life or sacrifice creatures to cast spells or activate abilities.

card.name: Angelic Armaments
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a white Angel in addition to its other colors and types. Equip {4}

card.name: Angel's Mercy
card.text: You gain 7 life.

card.name: Angel's Tomb
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Angel's Tomb become a 3/3 white Angel artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Appetite for Brains
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it with converted mana cost 4 or greater and exile that card.

card.name: Arcane Melee
card.text: Instant and sorcery spells cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Archangel
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Archwing Dragon
card.text: Flying, haste At the beginning of the end step, return Archwing Dragon to its owner's hand.

card.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
card.text: Flying, vigilance, indestructible Other permanents you control have indestructible.

card.name: Banishing Stroke
card.text: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library. Miracle {W}

card.name: Banners Raised
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Barter in Blood
card.text: Each player sacrifices two creatures.

card.name: Battle Hymn
card.text: Add {R} to your mana pool for each creature you control.

card.name: Bladed Bracers
Blessings of Nature
card.text: Distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures. Miracle {G}

card.name: Blood Artist
card.text: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Bloodflow Connoisseur
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodflow Connoisseur.

card.name: Bone Splinters
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Bone Splinters, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

card.name: Bonfire of the Damned
card.text: Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player and each creature he or she controls. Miracle {X}{R}

card.name: Borderland Ranger
card.text: When Borderland Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Bower Passage
card.text: Creatures with flying can't block creatures you control.

card.name: Bruna, Light of Alabaster
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever Bruna, Light of Alabaster attacks or blocks, you may attach to it any number of Auras on the battlefield and you may put onto the battlefield attached to it any number of Aura cards that could enchant it from your graveyard and/or hand.

card.name: Builder's Blessing
card.text: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.

card.name: Burn at the Stake
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Burn at the Stake, tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Burn at the Stake deals damage to target creature or player equal to three times the number of creatures tapped this way.

card.name: Call to Serve
card.text: Enchant nonblack creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2, has flying, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.

card.name: Captain of the Mists
card.text: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, untap Captain of the Mists. {1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent.

card.name: Cathars' Crusade
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Cathedral Sanctifier
card.text: When Cathedral Sanctifier enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Cavern of Souls
card.text: As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

card.name: Champion of Lambholt
card.text: Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

card.name: Cloudshift
card.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Commander's Authority
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 1/1 white Human creature token onto the battlefield."

card.name: Conjurer's Closet
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Corpse Traders
card.text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Craterhoof Behemoth
card.text: Haste When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Crippling Chill
card.text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Draw a card.

card.name: Crypt Creeper
card.text: Sacrifice Crypt Creeper: Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Cursebreak
card.text: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Dangerous Wager
card.text: Discard your hand, then draw two cards.

card.name: Dark Impostor
card.text: {4}{B}{B}: Exile target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Dark Impostor. Dark Impostor has all activated abilities of all creature cards exiled with it.

card.name: Deadeye Navigator
card.text: Soulbond As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

card.name: Death Wind
card.text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Defang
card.text: Enchant creature Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

card.name: Defy Death
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Demolish
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

card.name: Demonic Rising
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control exactly one creature, put a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Demonic Taskmaster
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature other than Demonic Taskmaster.

card.name: Demonlord of Ashmouth
card.text: Flying When Demonlord of Ashmouth enters the battlefield, exile it unless you sacrifice another creature. Undying

card.name: Descendants' Path
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card that shares a creature type with a creature you control, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Otherwise, put that card on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Descent into Madness
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a despair counter on Descent into Madness, then each player exiles X permanents he or she controls and/or cards from his or her hand, where X is the number of despair counters on Descent into Madness.

card.name: Desolate Lighthouse
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}{U}{R}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Devastation Tide
card.text: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands. Miracle {1}{U}

card.name: Devout Chaplain
card.text: {T}, Tap two untapped Humans you control: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Diregraf Escort
card.text: Soulbond As long as Diregraf Escort is paired with another creature, both creatures have protection from Zombies.

card.name: Divine Deflection
card.text: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you and/or permanents you control this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Divine Deflection deals that much damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Dread Slaver
card.text: Whenever a creature dealt damage by Dread Slaver this turn dies, return it to the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Dreadwaters
card.text: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of lands you control.

card.name: Driver of the Dead
card.text: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Druid's Familiar
card.text: Soulbond As long as Druid's Familiar is paired with another creature, each of those creatures gets +2/+2.

card.name: Druids' Repository
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, put a charge counter on Druids' Repository. Remove a charge counter from Druids' Repository: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Dual Casting
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{R}, {T}: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy."

card.name: Eaten by Spiders
card.text: Destroy target creature with flying and all Equipment attached to that creature.

card.name: Elgaud Shieldmate
card.text: Soulbond As long as Elgaud Shieldmate is paired with another creature, both creatures have hexproof.

card.name: Emancipation Angel
card.text: Flying When Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Entreat the Angels
card.text: Put X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield. Miracle {X}{W}{W}

card.name: Essence Harvest
card.text: Target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: Evernight Shade
card.text: {B}: Evernight Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Undying

card.name: Exquisite Blood
card.text: Whenever an opponent loses life, you gain that much life.

card.name: Falkenrath Exterminator
card.text: Whenever Falkenrath Exterminator deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it. {2}{R}: Falkenrath Exterminator deals damage to target creature equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on Falkenrath Exterminator.

card.name: Favorable Winds
card.text: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1.

card.text: Haste When Fervent Cathar enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

card.text: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.text: Flowering Lumberknot can't attack or block unless it's paired with a creature with soulbond.

card.text: Soulbond As long as Galvanic Alchemist is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{2}{U}: Untap this creature."

card.name: Gang of Devils
card.text: When Gang of Devils dies, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures and/or players.

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap or untap target permanent."

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight
card.text: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

card.name: Gloom Surgeon
card.text: If combat damage would be dealt to Gloom Surgeon, prevent that damage and exile that many cards from the top of your library.

card.name: Gloomwidow
card.text: Reach Gloomwidow can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Goldnight Commander
card.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Goldnight Redeemer
card.text: Flying When Goldnight Redeemer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each other creature you control.

card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.text: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. If that creature is a Zombie, exile it.

It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. -2: Draw a card for each tapped creature target player controls. -8: You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size" and "Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may return it to your hand."

card.name: Trusted Forcemage
card.text: Soulbond As long as Trusted Forcemage is paired with another creature, each of those creatures gets +1/+1.

card.name: Tyrant of Discord
card.text: When Tyrant of Discord enters the battlefield, target opponent chooses a permanent he or she controls at random and sacrifices it. If a nonland permanent is sacrificed this way, repeat this process.

card.name: Ulvenwald Tracker
card.text: {1}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

card.name: Uncanny Speed
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Undead Executioner
card.text: When Undead Executioner dies, you may have target creature get -2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Unhallowed Pact
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Vanguard's Shield
card.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and can block an additional creature. Equip {3}

card.name: Vanishment
card.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library. Miracle {U}

card.name: Vessel of Endless Rest
card.text: When Vessel of Endless Rest enters the battlefield, put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Vexing Devil
card.text: When Vexing Devil enters the battlefield, any opponent may have it deal 4 damage to him or her. If a player does, sacrifice Vexing Devil.

card.name: Vigilante Justice
card.text: Whenever a Human enters the battlefield under your control, Vigilante Justice deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Voice of the Provinces
card.text: Flying When Voice of the Provinces enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Human creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Wandering Wolf
card.text: Creatures with power less than Wandering Wolf's power can't block it.

card.name: Wild Defiance
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of an instant or sorcery spell, that creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Wildwood Geist
card.text: Wildwood Geist gets +2/+2 as long as it's your turn.

card.name: Wingcrafter
card.text: Soulbond As long as Wingcrafter is paired with another creature, both creatures have flying.

card.name: Wolfir Avenger
card.text: Flash {1}{G}: Regenerate Wolfir Avenger.

card.name: Wolfir Silverheart
card.text: Soulbond As long as Wolfir Silverheart is paired with another creature, each of those creatures gets +4/+4.

card.name: Yew Spirit
card.text: {2}{G}{G}: Yew Spirit gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

card.name: Zealous Conscripts
card.text: Haste When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Zealous Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains first strike until end of turn.
